title: Jennifer Aniston has a separate phone only for Instagram
text:
Cape Town - Jennifer Aniston is determined not to "become consumed" by Instagram that she has a separate phone that she uses solely for the photo sharing app.

The 50-year-old actress broke records when she joined Instagram last week, bagging over a million followers in just 45 minutes after posting a photo of herself with her former Friends co-stars.



But despite her success on the site, she has no intention of posting every single thing she does, so much so that she's decided to keep it entirely separate from her everyday life.



(Compiled by Graye Morkel)
description: Jennifer Aniston is determined not to "become consumed" by Instagram that she has a separate phone that she uses solely for the photo sharing app.
